= Introduction =

This page has operating instructions for the Atari 5200 core.

= Links =
  * [http://www.scrameta.net/autobuild/ Core binaries]
  
= Installation =

In the binary folder, go into the latest folder and find the *atari5200.rbf* file located under /mist_5200/build_NTSC_VGA/out/ (or 

Copy the file to the root of an SD card. You can rename it as core.rbf if you want to make it the default core when the MiST boots.

Create the following sub-folders in the SD card (note the missing i):
 * /atar5200/
 * /atar5200/rom/
 * /atar5200/user/

Copy an image of the Atari5200 ROM into the /rom/ folder, then rename it to *5200.rom*.

Copy games into the /atar5200/user/ folder.
